page_content: Information about the annual Motorfahrerrepetitorium of the Civil Protection in the training center Schönau in Cham, including theoretical and practical training on maneuvering vehicles with trailers.

Information about the bankruptcy statistics for the year 2020 in the Canton of Zug, including details on the number of bankruptcies, reasons, and a mention of a new software application introduced in the bankruptcy office.

Information about the eTax.zug software for legal entities, including instructions on how to fill out tax returns electronically, download links for different operating systems, and related forms and guides.
Information about the initiative "Reparieren statt wegwerfen" in the Canton of Zug, promoting repair over disposal, including details about Repair Cafés and the platform Reparaturführer.ch.
